WorkItem.ClosedComment: Levva was still working on the AddOn when you updated. Several revisions have occurred since then
WorkItem.Description:
I exported my upgrade list from Rawr 4, and then pasted it into the addon. Now, it crashes whenever I try to view the upgrade panel. To reproduce:
1) Open up your character sheet.
2) Right click the Rawr icon on the bottom left.
 
This was observed in r57006.
 
Here's the info from the crash:
